resources.string: Meet \'Taskit,\' your daily sustainability companion app. Taskit is designed to inspire and empower you to reduce your carbon footprint through small, meaningful actions. Every 24 hours, Taskit assigns you a set of eco-friendly tasks, from embracing public transportation to embracing energy efficiency, that align with your goals for a greener world. Track your accomplishments, unlock badges, and accumulate points as you complete tasks, all while contributing to a more sustainable future. With Taskit, you can lead the way in creating a better tomorrow, one task at a time.
